metadata.title: Human Betacoronavirus 2c EMC/2012- related Viruses in Bats, Ghana and Europe

abstract.original_text: We screened fecal specimens of 4,758 bats from Ghana and 272 bats from 4 European countries for betacoronaviruses. Viruses related to the novel human betacoronavirus EMC/2012 were detected in 46 (24.9%) of 185 Nycteris bats and 40 (14.7%) of 272 Pipistrellus bats. Their genetic relatedness indicated EMC/2012 originated from bats.

sentences.segment_text: We screened fecal specimens of 4,758 bats from Ghana and 272 bats from 4 European countries for betacoronaviruses .
Viruses related to the novel human betacoronavirus EMC/2012 were detected in 46 ( 24.9 % ) of 185 Nycteris bats and 40 ( 14.7 % ) of 272 Pipistrellus bats .
Their genetic relatedness indicated EMC/2012 originated from bats .
